item.description:
This meet-up is called 'The 20 / 30 Ride' because we will do a 20 mile ride north of Concord, and then a 30 mile ride south of Concord.

You are welcome to do 20 miles, 30 miles, or both! Both rides will start from the same launch point. (Meet-Up Spot Map / Meet-Up Spot Street View)

The ride north (20N MAP) will begin promptly at 10:35am, and we will aim to return to Concord Center around 12noon so that we can get a bite to eat and digest for a while before heading out for part 2 of the ride.

The ride south (30S MAP) will begin at 1:05pm, where we will be joined by our after lunch riders. If you are only going to the 30 south ride, but you want to meet us for lunch in Concord Ctr, email me and we can coordinate.

If you are doing the 20 mile portion, please be sure you can keep a decent pace. I only say this because I don't want to run late for the 30 mile ride. The 30 mile ride can be a slightly slower pace if necessary.

$2 bucks meet-up fee which goes to Rob (the organizer) who pays for this group to exist.

Hope you can make it to at least one of the two rides!
See you then.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the guy with the orange messanger bag
item.name: The 20 / 30 Ride
